nde2.methodcalls

Class BaseMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseMethodCall, BaseMethodCall

    public abstract class BaseMethodCall
extends Object
    This is where the plumbing for the web service lives. This class should not be inherited directly, try using either BaseMethodCall or BaseMethodCall (though really, at this level of abstraction, this can be used for ANY service with an interface like NDE2.
    Author:
    filip

    • Method Detail

      • doCall_base

        protected Document doCall_base(String endpoint,
                   String method,
                   Map<String,String> params)
                        throws ParserConfigurationException,
                               SAXException,
                               IOException,
                               XPathExpressionException,
                               NDE2Exception
        Really generic method for wrapping the NDE2 web service (though really, it may as well be any JAX-WS service, I guess?). Based on parameters given, it queries the endpoint and returns a Document that was returned by the server.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Base URL for the call (i.e. http://example.com/WebService)
        method - Name of the web service method to call
        params - Parameters to call the method with
        Returns:
        A Document representation of the server's response to the method call.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - When the parser can't be namespace-aware.
        SAXException - When the document at the given URL could be parsed. May indicate a server error.
        IOException - When any IOExceptions occur when pulling the response. May indicate connection problems.
        XPathExpressionException - When the XPath is messed up
        NDE2Exception - When the server signals an error in the query
